name: Cold Turkey
description:
You're one cold turkey! That's because you've lost all your tail feathers!

Find them all and return to the barn as quickly as possible, while avoiding the hungry, hungry human.

Challenges!

  • Can you beat 30 seconds? Is it possible to beat 20 19 18 seconds? Tell me your best time!
  • Can you find the secret exit???

Controls:

  • Move: Arrow keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Retry: Esc

------

This game was made in an evening using assets hand-drawn by my wife. :)
